You can choose whether you want to add i: O ka tlhopha gore a o batla go tsenya lotseno kgotsa ditshenyegelo mo tlhagisong ya gago ya lotseno
Let's go through one example! Tap income: A reyeng mo sekaong se le sengwe! Tobetsa income
See a list of income types. For income t: Bona lenane la mefuta ya matseno. Go lotseno le le seng mo lenaneng le, o ka tlhopha 'Other'
Let's pretend you received a donation to: A re re o amogetse moneelo gompieno,tobetsa fano!
You will need to fill in all the info on: O tlaa tlhoka go tlatsa tshedimosetso yotlhe mo sekirining se
I've filled in an example for you! Now t: Ke go tlaleditse sekao! Jaanong tobetsa Save
Great! Your income has now been added to: Bontle! Letseno la gago le tlaleleditswe mo tshobokanyong ya tlhagiso ya lotseno mo lefelong la madi
You can see, change, or download you sta: 0 ka kgona go bona diphetogo kgotsa go itsela dikwalo tsa gago ka go tobetsa konopo eno.
